title: 1960 panel van for sale in USA

posts.content:
Hello
I am placing a add for sale in the USA,is a 1960 vw split panelvan
With a 1776 sp dual carbs,rebuilt engine
Drives sweet as been told by the owner,this bus is solid
But has had work done in the past
I can email you tons of photos if you give me your email address
I have spoken to the seller on the phone and he is a really cool guy,only selling
Due to a new baby arriving in august
So if there's any interest you can email me or
Email the seller at justdeej365@yahoo.com
And his name is dj
Please remember this bus is in Salt Lake City Utah usa
Looking for $10500 usd
Thank you
please send pics to shauncoope@hotmail.com
